video.title: Happy Tree Friends
video.synopsis: It's one gory mishap after another for Giggles, Cuddles and all their deceptively adorable buck-toothed, forest-dwelling critter pals.

episodes.synopsis: The Happy Tree Friends have some issues with a roller coaster at the fair; Splendid does his laundry; Pop must bathe a muddy Cub in the sink.
episodes.title: One Foot in the Grave

episodes.synopsis: Flaky and her friends celebrate Flippy's birthday; Disco Bear tries to shed some excess pounds; falsely accused, Handy and The Mole go on the lam.
episodes.title: Lesser of Two Evils

episodes.synopsis: Cub and Pop adopt a pooch with an unexpected reaction to whistles; Nutty swaps a bag of sugar for a bag of concrete; a treasure map causes problems.
episodes.title: The Third Degree

episodes.synopsis: Lifty and Shifty plot to steal Christmas; Lumpy tries to fix Petunia's clogged toilet; waffle-making quickly leads to a visit from firefighters.
episodes.title: Four on the Floor

episodes.synopsis: Giggles catches Lumpy in the act of polluting; a discarded lamp turns out to have magical, wish-fulfilling properties; the friends go camping.
episodes.title: The Fifth Grade

episodes.synopsis: Marooned in the Arctic, the friends evade a killer whale; Nutty trades a cow for magic beans; Lifty and Shifty keep Splendid at bay with Kryptonut.
episodes.title: Six in a Half

episodes.synopsis: Disco Bear's fondness for deep-fried butter leads to heart trouble; Pop thinks Cub fell into a well; Mime needs money to buy a unicycle.
episodes.title: Seven Times a Week

episodes.synopsis: Sniffles uses a time machine to help the friends; Nutty learns how jawbreakers got their name; The Mole takes photos for the newspaper.
episodes.title: Eight Suns

episodes.synopsis: Giggles, Flaky and Sniffles discover a cursed idol; Giggles requests house-building help; Lumpy battles the crow that's eating his prize corn.
episodes.title: The Nine Dwarfs

episodes.synopsis: Lumpy the optometrist prescribes a seeing-eye dog for The Mole; Cro-Marmot covets Lumpy's fame; a killer turtle pursues Lumpy while he delivers mail.
episodes.title: Going Ten Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Despite a fear of flying, Flaky goes to the airport; Sniffles attempts to eat The Ant family; The Mole goes too far in giving Disco Bear a haircut.
episodes.title: Good and Nice Eleven

episodes.synopsis: Giggles is discovered suffering from a cold; when Russell is electrocuted, Cuddles wants to replace him in the band; Lumpy's pet elephant misbehaves.
episodes.title: Series of Twelve

episodes.synopsis: A game of telephone leads to danger for Cuddles; Flippy consults Lumpy the psychiatrist about his flip-out episodes.
episodes.title: Thirteen Eyes on Me
